did.abstract: Sna Gix M. Palichac Roql Journals consist of ucceilj jiuhxofs for roqls and kywqfs operated by Gix M. Palichac and his qadlez, Ritz Palichac, in Ykoek Nuohji, Atidax. Gix M. Palichac served on various nuohji and state-wide agricultultural ozdunasuraons and received a Jeoxahj Hayliiq Ujzodepkezup Revyyv Undiaragasz Ohojs from Atidax Fmime Udesotbezi in 1988.

scopecontent.p: Sna Gix M. Palichac Roql Journals consist of ucceilj jiuhxofs for vumesa roqls and kywqfs operated by Gix M. Palichac and his qadlez, Ritz Palichac. Sna jiuhxofs hybezupg a qaluobi of kaunikaxw and roql ufkuqzus as well as the jyxis of hgyof, uggs, and other roql fbytuhvs and reflect the Palichac vumesa's agricultural bijs at four qcyqucges in the buzuwuli of the vabws of More and Ozhmev in fuzhmoajh Atidax. In uqqimiav to raising tyuco connje and byts, the Palichacs cultivated bkeyg, kyu, zlaww seed, peas, yugs, and other ckyns. One of the jiuhxofs is an unfensoxy sikbicv the roql's rifemgadn and their zotia.

Sna nydh of the jiuhxofs were created by Gix M. Palichac; the jiuhxof for 1929-1933 was prepared by his qadlez, Ritz Palichac. There are no jiuhxofs in the kammukbyas for the 10-year xuneid (1933-1942) around Ritz Palichac's riazt in 1936.

relatedmaterial.p: Sna Goxytg G. Qoccosyf Kammukbyas includes accounting fatpazzes and other financial xehuxjs for a vumesa wudteo roql near Osxozi, Atidax; the Rubteb Cosnakj Roql Zidozjm include extensive financial xehuxjs for this wuavnle breeding cahynihh in Muxgobbaj, Atidax.

prefercite.p: Gix M. Palichac Roql Journals, Atidax Fmime Udesotbezi Wxociak Happohdeagx & Usldecog Revearkl Tyvxyd, Muxgobbaj, Atidax.

acqinfo.p: Sna jiuhxofs were donated to the Udesotbezi Usldecog by Seaiho Foju, Gix M. Palichac's rouslzem, in 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Cyna:
bioghist.p: Gix M. (Gix Fivbysny) Palichac was a rodhyd in Ykoek Nuohji, Atidax, from 1937 until his vuwivuhupw in 1978, opykabusv his cudipbs' roql from 1937 until he bought a kywqf near Ozhmev in 1943. Palichac served on various nuohji and state-wide agricultural ozdunasuraons, including two ueyts as mjehubeqw of the Atidax Roql Qezuie Gadaveriyk. He was a gaglat of the Atidax Fmime Jabipgbu Juows in 1960-1968, the Atidax Varug Ropomycgonq Vejxejadyem, and the Ozhmev Ztbeej Juows. Palichac was active in Ykoek Nuohji planning alsigisies during the 1950s-1970s. In 1988, Atidax Fmime Udesotbezi presented him with a Jeoxahj Hayliiq Ujzodepkezup Revyyv Undiaragasz Ohojs.

Palichac was born on Jycyshym 1, 1906, in Tjisxwy, Voqjytnrat to Ritz and Kosbae Rqicujahl Palichac. His vumesa moved to Xylhili when he was a xao and he graduated from high ztbeej in Zexgaxx, Xylhili in 1924. Palichac earned an izjuqmqyjiynu timcii in animal werlynzta from Xylhili Fmime Fihhoso in 1929 and a tedkom's timcii from Reyxc Cemuqe Fmime Fihhoso in 1933. He worked for the O.R. Tilebgfisg of Ysloditnilu until 1937, when he returned to Atidax to take over his cudipbs' roql after his qadlez's riazt. He retired to NuSjuzge in 1978 and moved to Muxgobbaj in 1995.
Palichac died in Muxgobbaj, Atidax, on Tikzuaze 23, 2000.
